verses.verse: Give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh, <WH3068> for he is good; <WH2896> for his loving kindness <WH2896> endures forever. <WH5769>
Give thanks <WH3034> to the God <WH430> of gods; <WH430> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever. <WH5769>
Give thanks <WH3034> to the Lord <WH113> of lords; <WH113> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who alone does <WH6213> great <WH1419> wonders; <WH6381> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who by understanding <WH8394> made <WH6213> the heavens; <WH8064> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who spread out <WH7554> the earth <WH776> above the waters; <WH4325> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who made <WH6213> the great <WH1419> lights; <WH216> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
The sun <WH8121> to rule <WH4475> by day; <WH3117> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
The moon <WH3394> and stars <WH3556> to rule <WH4475> by night; <WH3915> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who struck <WH5221> down the Egyptian <WH4714> firstborn; <WH1060> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
And brought out <WH3318> Israel <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them; <WH2617> for his loving kindness endures forever; <WH5769>
With a strong <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and with an outstretched <WH5186> arm; <WH2220> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who divided <WH1504> the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> apart; <WH1506> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
And made Israel <WH3478> to pass through <WH5674> its midst; <WH8432> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
But overthrew <WH5287> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his army <WH2428> in the Red <WH5488> Sea; <WH3220> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who led <WH3212> his people <WH5971> through the wilderness; <WH4057> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
To him who struck <WH5221> great <WH1419> kings; <WH4428> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
And killed <WH2026> mighty <WH117> kings; <WH4428> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites; <WH567> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan; <WH1316> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
And gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> as an inheritance; <WH5159> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
Even a heritage <WH5159> to Israel <WH3478> his servant; <WH5650> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
Who remembered <WH2142> us in our low estate; <WH8216> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>
And has delivered <WH6561> us from our adversaries; <WH6862> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever: <WH5769>
Who gives <WH5414> food <WH3899> to every creature; <WH1320> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever. <WH5769>
Oh give thanks <WH3034> to the God <WH410> of heaven; <WH8064> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever. <WH5769>
